column5: Just wondering, I'll be in the Grmsby area this afternoon and was wondering what access point I can go to do some Salmon shore fishing. Any ideas?
Those nor'easters yesterday made complete mud of the inshore water fo a long ways out.
So I guess it's a no go for me?
give it a try if you want, yesterday the waves were breaking over the pier at the mouth of Forty Creek, wind has died somewhat you might get on it.
Try fifty point conservation.  You wont catch anything if you dont try
i think you should try 50 pt. good luck, make sure to tell us if you get anything!!
Never made it out there yesterday. Truck overheated in the morning. Ruined my whole Saturday. ?
